# About this notebook Hi, my name is Hugo! I'm the person behind Elixir Radar. 😃

This is an exploration of the data generated by [Elixir Radar](https://elixir-radar.com/). Elixir Radar is the email newsletter for Elixir developers. Every week, we publish a new issue containing curated articles, videos, job listings and community events. Here's [an example of one of our newsletter issues](https://sendy.elixir-radar.com/w/BNoHZTqLnAByWgOl6x892ZRw/J8921cxQ4jeEDmbVKDWh02aw/mAWw9YlMu2az2nE2BcrTXw).
